snippet: Amazon Web Services already has the largest share of the worldwide cloud-computing market, and is looking for ways to expand the range of services it offers.
abstract: Amazon Web Services, with biggest share of the worldwide cloud-computing market at 27 percent, is looking for ways to expand the range of services and processes it offers over the Internet that can compete with more traditional business technology.
lead_paragraph: Amazon Web Services already has the largest share of the worldwide cloud-computing market, and is looking for ways to expand the range of services it offers.

headline.main: Amazon Moves to Extend Cloud-Computing Dominance
headline.print_headline: Amazon Moves to Extend Cloud-Computing Dominance
